channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI

item.title: Report E-2023110120
item.description:
Report E-2023110120

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: JANESVILLE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On October 26, 2023, one (1) 5-gallon pail of UN1263 was crushed in transit and released approximately five (5) ounces of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from HazChem Environmental (HCE) to remediate the impacted site. HCE personnel overpacked the damaged pail in one (1) 55-gallon drum for future disposal.

item.title: Report X-2023100878
item.description:
Report X-2023100878

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: MENOMONEE FALLS
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking and given to QA to inspect. DescribePack: 2 of the drums were dented and the top of the cans were pushed in forcing the lids to loosen up DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in a tote and given to QA to inspect.

item.title: Report X-2023100846
item.description:
Report X-2023100846

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the box in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: Upon inspection found the box wet and with a hole in it. once opened found that one of four bottles of ethanol solutions has a loose and broken cap. a small Amount leaked out causing the box to be damaged. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into the in the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023100659
item.description:
Report X-2023100659

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found loaded incorrectly, near back wall of trailer on its side. after discovering it was leaking, it was placed into a black bin and moved to the ventilation area in the hazmat cage while going through procedure, until it was eventually repacked and awaiting disposition DescribePack: All 4 of the bottles contained loose caps, however only one of them managed to leak. Lost about 3/4 of its contents, causing it to soak into the fiberboard packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: box was positioned up right as soon as it was discovered and brought to QA's attention immediately
